Name: HMO001 - HMO licence form pdf
Output_template:
{"name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
Form name {form_name}
Reference {reference}
Date {today_en}

Your details

Are you applying to be the licence holder? {holder}
Who are you ? {who}
@af:if({nameOriginator} != '')
Please give your name and interest in the property {nameOriginator}
@endaf:if
@af:if({who} = 'agent')

Management agency name

@endaf:if
{#agency/SF_Sum}
@af:if({who} != '')

Owner details

{#customer/SF_Sum}
@endaf:if
@af:if({holder} = 'no' and {who} = 'agent')
Is the owner the licence holder? {ownerLicence}
@endaf:if
@af:if({licencePDF} = 'True')

Licence holder details

{#person/SF_Sum}
@endaf:if
{lblResponsible} the person responsible for the 'day to day' control of the HMO and bound by the conditions of the licence, if granted ? {responsible}
Will you be using a Letting Agent to maintain the conditions of the licence ? {agent}
@af:if({agent} = 'yes')
Please provide the name of the Letting Agent {name}
Letting Agent Address {lettingAgentAdd/AdTextArea_out}
@endaf:if
{lblResponsible} part of a Company, Trust or Partnership ? {company}
@af:if({company} = 'yes')

Company, Trust or Partnership details

@endaf:if
{#companyDetails/SF_Sum}
{lblResponsible} a member of the Rent It Right scheme (LAS) ? {member}
@af:if({member} = 'yes')
Please provide the membership number {number}
@endaf:if
{lblOtherAuthOther} own or manage a HMO that is licenced by another LA ? {manage}
@af:if({manage} = 'yes')

Head office / Main contact details of Company, Trust or Partnership

{#trust/SF_Sum}
Please provide the name of the other local authority(s) {localAuthority}
@endaf:if
{lblOtherAuthOther} own or manage any properties within another LA area ? {own}
@af:if({own} = 'yes')
Please provide the name of the other Local Authority(s) {otherAuthority}
@endaf:if
{lblOtherAuthOther} own or manage any other privately let properties? {anyOther}
@af:if({anyOther} != 'no')
Please provide details {#details}
Are any of these properties currently licensable by Portsmouth City Council? {#currentLicen}
@endaf:if
Type of licence {licence}
@af:if({licence} = 'renewal')
Expiry date of the current HMO licence {expiryDate}
Is the licence with the same owner? {sameLicence}
@endaf:if
@af:if({expiryDate} < {today} or {sameLicence} = 'no')

This application has been treated as a new licence.

@endaf:if
@af:repeat({application})

Property to be licensed

{#application/SF_SumAdd}
Type of HMO {application/type}
Is there any other business use in the property ? {application/otherBusiness}
@af:if({application/otherBusiness} = 'yes')
Other business details {#application/detailsBusiness}
@endaf:if
Total number of occupants in the property {application/totalOccupants}
Number of habitable rooms {application/NBRooms}
Number of floors {application/NBFloors}

Bedroom / Occupants

How many bedrooms are there {application/noBedrooms}
{#application/sumTableOcc}

Facilities

Number of cookers {application/NBCookers}
Total number of sinks {application/NBSinks}
Number of shower/bathrooms {application/NBShowers}
Number of toilets in shower/bathrooms with wash hand basins {application/NBToilets}
Number of separate toilets with wash hand basins {application/NBSeparate}
Does the property have a gas supply? {application/gasSupply}
@af:if({application/certificate} != '')
Have you provided your certificates within the last 6 months for this property ? {application/certificate}
@endaf:if
{#application/uploadFilenames}
@endaf:repeat

Calculated cost and card payment

Total cost Â£{TotalCost}
Card payment transaction reference {transaction_reference}
@af:if({toGetConsent} = '1')

Consent

To process your application we may need further information, this will be based on the information provided we therefore need your permission to discuss your application with the involved parties.
@af:if({ownerAgree} = 'agree')
{#forOwnerConsent}
{ownerAgree}
@endaf:if
@af:if({licenceAgree} = 'agree')
{#forLettingAgentCo}
{licenceAgree}
@endaf:if
@af:if({agentAgree} = 'agree')
{#forCompTrustConsen}
{agentAgree}
@endaf:if
@endaf:if

Declaration

Have you advised the parties identified previously of your application? {advised}
You must let certain people know in writing that you have made this application. These people are:
  1. Mortgage of the property.
  2. Owner of the property to which the application relates: eg: the freeholder and any head lessees who are known.
  3. Any person who is a tenant or long term leaseholder of any part (including any flat) who is known to you other than a statutory tenant or other tenant.
  4. The proposed licencee holder.
  5. The proposed managing agent , if applicable.
  6. Any person who has agreed that they will be bound by any condtion(s) in a licence if granted.

We are required by law to provide certain information on a public register and this includes the licence holders name , address and contact details.

*I confirm that as the proposed licence holder and/or proposed manager

I do not have any unspent convictions particulary in respect of any offences involving fraud or other dishonesty, or violence or drugs, or any offences listed under Schedule 3, of Sexual Offences Act 2003 {convictions}
I have not been found guilty by any court or tribunal of practising unlawful discrimination on grounds of sex, colour, race, ethnic or national origins or disability in , or in connection with , the carrying on of any business. {guilty}
I have not had any judgments (whether civil or criminal) against me under housing, environmental health, public health or landlord and tenant law {judge}
I have not acted otherwise than in accordance with any applicable code of practice approved under Section 233 of the Housing Act 2004 {acted}
*I confirm that as the proposed licence holder and/or proposed manager the following does not apply to anyone I am associated with on a personal , work or other basis
Are not in control of any property subject to a Control Order under S379 of the Housing Act 1985 or Demolition Order in the last 5 years {control}
Are not in control of a property that has been subject to the service of an Improvement Notice, a Prohibition Order, a Hazard awareness notice, or Emergency Remedial Action under the Housing Act 2004 {control2}
Have not not been refused a licence or had a licence revoked for any property in relation to a property under the Housing Act 2004 {refused}
Have not been found to have breached a condition of a licence for any property under the Housing Act 2004 {breached}
Are not in control of any property, which has subsequently been the subject of an Interim or Final Management Order or Special Interim Management Order under the Housing Act 2004 {control3}

Declarations / Conditions

I declare that I have written to or emailed all the people who have a legal interest in the property and that these are the only people known to me that are required to be informed that I have made this application
I declare that to the best of my knowledge I have obtained Fit and Proper persons declarations for all other people involved in the management of the property named in this application
I confirm that I agree in principal to be bound to the restrictions and obligations in the licence
I accept that in connection with the checking of the accuracy of this declaration that the local authority will share this information with other statutory bodies, other local authorities and the police
I understand that I commit an offence if I supply any information under parts 1 to 4 of the Housing Act 2004 that is false or misleading and which I know is false and misleading or am/are reckless as to whether it is false or misleading
I understand that I will have legal responsibilities and could be liable to prosecution if I contravene the licence conditions
I understand that I will have an opportunity to make representations on the conditions when the proposed licence is issued
I declare that the information contained in this application is correct to the best of my knowledge
Name/Signature {nameSignature}
Date {date}
"}
